• About
  • Philosophy
  • Overview
    • Browser Extension
    • Recommendation Studio
    • Data Donation

Youchoose is an environment that allows you to experience a different recommendation system. What you need to see new content is a browser extension, available for Chrome and Firefox. Algorithms are opinionated too, especially when they try to boost ads revenues.

Contacts

The Team

We are a non profit. We defend internet users against corporation.

  • All
  • Development
  • Strategy
  • User Research
  • Design
  • Legal

Claudio Agosti

Free-software developer and privacy analyst. He co-founded the project, and designs and supervises its tech stack.

Marc Faddoul

AI researcher and algorithmic designer. He co-founded the project, and drives its strategy and development.

Primavera De Filippi

Blockchain expert and legal scholar. She co-founded the project, and oversees its governance.

Andrea Ascari

Full stack-developer. He lead the development of YouChoose's front and backend.

François-Marie de Jouvencel

Full stack-developer and product manager. He contributes his technical and product experience.

Giulia Corona

Communication designer and data analyst. She works on the UX design and visuals.

Silvia Semenzin

Post-doctoral researcher in Sociology. She is in charge of the community building of YouChoose.

Salvatore Romano

Social Psychologist. He supervises the user experience research.

Alessandro Polidoro

Lawyer experienced in data protection law. He advises the team on legal issues.
